refnamediv.refpurpose: STKSitar uses a plucked string physical model.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in stkopd. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
STKSitar uses a plucked string physical model based on the Karplus-Strong algorithm.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifrequency -- Frequency of note played, in Hertz.

note.title: Note
note.para: The code for this opcode is taken directly from the Sitar class in the Synthesis Toolkit in C++ by Perry R. Cook and Gary P. Scavone. More on the STK classes can be found here: https://ccrma.stanford.edu/software/stk/classes.html
